max.SERVICE_NAME:
select date, time
from coin_slope_stats
where code = ?
and date != 'date1'
order by date desc, time desc
limit 0,1

factors.SERVICE_NAME:
select name , date, time
from coin_slope_stats
where code = ?
and date = ?
and time = ?
group by name
factors.aop_point_method:
import com.stuko.anaconda.business.*;
import com.stuko.anaconda.value.*;

BusinessCollection bc = (BusinessCollection)result.getReturnObject("max");
if(bc != null && bc.size() > 0){
request.setFieldValue("date",bc.getBusinessData(0).getFieldValue("date"));
request.setFieldValue("time",bc.getBusinessData(0).getFieldValue("time"));
}else{
This.doProcessSkip(true);
}
